i1.blurb: Vel'Koz's abilities apply Organic Deconstruction to enemies on hit. If 3 stacks are accumulated, the enemy will take a burst of true damage.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Vel'Koz's''' [[Champion ability|abilities]] apply a ''Deconstruction'' stack for 7 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. Basic attacks refresh the duration on-hit.
The third stack consumes them all to deal {{pp|33 to 169}} {{as|(+ 50% AP)}} {{tip|true damage|{{as|'''bonus''' true damage}}}} and briefly grant {{tip|sight}} of the enemy.
i1.name: Organic Deconstruction

q1.blurb: Vel'Koz shoots a bolt of plasma that splits in two on reactivation or upon hitting an enemy. The bolt slows and damages on hit.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Vel'Koz''' fires an energy bolt that collides with the first enemy hit to deal {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} and {{tip|slow|slow}} by 70% for a few seconds, decaying over the duration.

At the end of its range, upon re-activation after {{fd|0.25}} seconds, or upon colliding with an enemy, the bolt splits in half, each part firing in opposite directions perpendicular to the primary bolt's trajectory.
leveling: {{st|Mana Restored On-Kill|{{as|{{ap|20 to 30}}|mana}}|Maximum Mana Restored|{{as|{{ap|20*3 to 30*3}}|mana}}}}
q1.name: Plasma Fission
notes: * An enemy cannot be hit by multiple bolts even when having blocked one with a spell shield.
* ''Plasma Fission'' can travel a maximum ~1521 units diagonally.

w1.blurb: Vel'Koz opens a rift to the void that deals an initial burst of damage, then explodes for a second burst of damage after a delay.
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Vel'Koz''' periodically [[stock]]s a ''Void Rift'' charge, up to a maximum of 2.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Vel'Koz''' opens a rift to the void that cuts through the ground in a line, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and leaving behind a trail. After a {{fd|0.25}} seconds delay, the trail detonates, dealing {{as|magic damage}}.
leveling:
{{st|Initial Magic Damage|{{ap|30 to 110}} {{as|(+ 15% AP)}}}}<!--
-->{{st|Detonation Magic Damage|{{ap|45 to 165}} {{as|(+ 25% AP)}}|Maximum Damage|{{ap|30+45 to 110+165}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}}}}
w1.name: Void Rift
notes: * '''Vel'Koz''' can cast ''Void Rift'' while moving but not while attacking.
* {{ai|Unbreakable|Braum}} and {{ai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}} will block the rift from forming over them, but they will not destroy the trail that was created before it.
* ''Void Rift'' must finish before another can be cast.

e1.blurb: Vel'Koz causes an area to explode, knocking up enemies, and knocking close enemies slightly away.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Vel'Koz''' hurls a disruptive anomaly that reaches the target location after {{fd|0.55}} seconds, briefly providing {{tip|sight}}, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|suspension|suspending}} enemies in the area for {{fd|0.75}} seconds. If the area is created close to '''Vel'Koz''', enemies hit are also slightly {{tip|airborne|knocked back}} in the direction of the cast.
e1.name: Tectonic Disruption
notes: * ''Tectonic Disruption's'' suspension is affected by {{ii|Mercury's Treads|Tenacity}}.
* The required proximity for displacement is relative to '''Vel'Koz's''' position when casting and not his current one.
* There is a brief ~{{fd|0.1}} second cast time before the projectile begins to travel.
* Although considered to be a projectile, {{ai|Unbreakable|Braum}} and {{ai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}} will block ''Tectonic Disruption'', but will not destroy it.

r1.blurb: Vel'Koz unleashes a channelled beam that follows the cursor for 2.5 seconds that deals magic damage. Organic Deconstruction Researches enemy champions causing them to take true damage instead.
description: {{sbc|Passive - Researched:}} {{ai|Organic Deconstruction|Vel'Koz|Deconstructing}} enemy champions marks them as ''{{ai|Researched|Vel'Koz}}'' for 7 seconds. Basic attacks and ability damage refresh the duration on-hit.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Vel'Koz''' {{ct|channels}} for {{fd|2.5}} seconds to project an energy beam in a line. The ray's trajectory updates itself over the duration to face the target direction. Reactivating ''Life Form Disintegration Ray'' ends the channel.

The ray deals {{as|magic damage}} in {{fd|0.25}} seconds intervals, and {{tip|slow|slows}} by 20% for 1 second. {{ai|Organic Deconstruction|Vel'Koz|Deconstruction}} is applied every {{fd|0.7}} seconds to enemies hit. {{ai|Researched|Vel'Koz|''Researched''}} enemies take {{as|true damage}} instead.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage Per Tick|{{ap|45 to 80}} {{as|(+ {{fd|12.5}}% AP)}}|Maximum Magic Damage|{{ap|45*10 to 80*10}} {{as|(+ 125% AP)}}}}
r1.name: Life Form Disintegration Ray
notes: * ''Life Form Disintegration Ray's'' trajectory updates gradually (moving the cursor from one side of '''Vel'Koz''' to the other will not make him rotate instantly).
* The beam covers '''Vel'Koz's '''hitbox, damaging enemies standing close.
